API_SOURCE.description: CDISC CT for define-xml taken from the CDISC library API.

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Terminology relevant to the subclasses of the ADaM basic data structure.
SKOS_CONCEPT.label: ADaM Basic Data Structure Subclass
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CDISC Define-XML ADaM Basic Data Structure Subclass Terminology

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: ADaM Medical Device Basic Data Structure Subclass
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Terminology relevant to the subclasses of the ADaM device level basic data structure.
SKOS_CONCEPT.label: ADaM Medical Device Basic Data Structure Subclass
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CDISC Define-XML ADaM Medical Device Basic Data Structure Subclass Terminology

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Terminology relevant to the subclasses of the ADaM occurrence data structure.
SKOS_CONCEPT.label: ADaM Occurrence Data Structure Subclass
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CDISC Define-XML ADaM Occurrence Data Structure Subclass Terminology

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Purpose of a specific analysis result described in Define-XML analysis results metadata.
SKOS_CONCEPT.label: Analysis Purpose

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Reason for reporting a specific analysis result described in Define-XML analysis results metadata.
SKOS_CONCEPT.label: Analysis Reason

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Terminology relevant to the classification of the CDISC controlled terminology standard described in the Define-XML document.
SKOS_CONCEPT.label: CDISC Controlled Terminology Standard Type
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CDISC Define-XML CDISC Controlled Terminology Standard Type Terminology

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: A name given to a reference source that lists words and gives their meaning. (NCI)
SKOS_CONCEPT.label: Dictionary Name

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Terminology related to the classification of a CDISC domain.
SKOS_CONCEPT.label: General Observation Class
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CDISC Define-XML General Observation Class Terminology

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Terminology relevant to the context in which the Define-XML document is used.
SKOS_CONCEPT.label: ODM Context

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Terminology relevant to the origin source for datasets in the Define-XML document.
SKOS_CONCEPT.label: Origin Source

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Terminology relevant to the origin type for datasets in the Define-XML document.
SKOS_CONCEPT.label: Origin Type

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Terminology relevant to the name of the standard described in the Define-XML document.
SKOS_CONCEPT.label: Standard Name

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Terminology relevant to the development or publication status of the standard.
SKOS_CONCEPT.label: Standard Status

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Terminology relevant to the classification of the standard described in the Define-XML document.
SKOS_CONCEPT.label: Standard Type

SKOS_CONCEPT_SCHEME.description: CDISC Controlled Terminology for Define-XML is the set of CDISC-developed or CDISC-adopted standard expressions (values) used with data items within CDISC-defined DEFINE-XML datasets.
SKOS_CONCEPT_SCHEME.label: Define-XML Controlled Terminology Package 48 Effective 2021-12-17
SKOS_CONCEPT_SCHEME.name: Define-XML CT 2021-12-17
SKOS_CONCEPT_SCHEME.source: Define-XML Controlled Terminology developed by the CDISC Terminology Team in collaboration with the National Cancer Institute's Enterprise Vocabulary Services (EVS)
